definition: first decapitate then present your trophy (idiom); act first, report later
early/prior/former/in advance/first
to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
to play music/to achieve/to present a memorial to the emperor (old)

sentences.english: He always acts first and reports afterwards.
Jiang Hai acting, given the order to attack.
sentences.chinese: 姜海“先斬後奏”，下達了攻擊命令。

traitor to one's love/heartless rat

chicken-hearted (idiom)/gutless

to lose one's cool/to get impatient/unable to remain calm
